title: Olivia Wilde suits up at SCAD Savannah Film Festival... after sharing rare snap of daughter Daisy
text:
Emmy-winning producer Olivia Wilde suited up for the Wonder Women: Directors panel at the 22nd SCAD Savannah Film Festival in Savannah on Tuesday.

The 35-year-old filmmaker donned a grey double-breasted blazer with a black top, pants, and high-heeled booties selected by stylist Karla Welch.

As usual, the native New Yorker rocked her signature ombré waves and winged cat eyeliner for the industry audience gathered at Gutstein Gallery.

In the hot seat! Emmy-winning producer Olivia Wilde suited up for the Wonder Women: Directors panel at the 22nd SCAD Savannah Film Festival in Savannah on Tuesday

Sitting pretty: The 35-year-old filmmaker donned a grey double-breasted blazer with a black top, pants, and high-heeled booties selected by stylist Karla Welch

'It's a genesis for female filmmakers right now,' Olivia said - according to SCAD's Instastories. 'And it's incredible to watch it happen.'

Wilde (born Cockburn) discussed her evolving career and likely addressed the controversy over Etihad Airways, Emirates, and Delta censoring a lesbian love scene from her movie Booksmart.

'I don't understand it,' the Life Itself actress told Variety on Sunday.

'There's censorship, airline to airline, of films, which there must be some kind of governing board to determine. We rate it a certain way. If it's not X-rated, surely it's acceptable on an airplane.

'There's insane violence of bodies being smashed in half and yet a love scene between two women is censored from the film. It's such an integral part of this character's journey. I don't understand it. My heart just broke. I'm trying to get to the bottom of it; I want people to experience the entire film.'

The Women's March speaker was joined at the Georgia fest (running through Saturday) by Pat Saperstein, Gail Mancuso, Jocelyn DeBoer, Dawn Luebbe, Annabelle Attanasio, Laure de Clermont-Tonnerre, and Kaila York.

On Monday night, Olivia - who boasts 6.3M social media followers - shared a rare snap of her three-year-old daughter Daisy relaxing on a bed while clad in a ballerina leotard and tutu.

Wilde also has a five-year-old son Otis Alexander with her fiancé Jason Sudeikis, who popped the question way back in January 2013.

Sudeikis ended his first marriage to writer-producer Kay Cannon in 2010, and the SAG Award nominee ended her first marriage to Italian filmmaker Tao Ruspoli in 2011.

Olivia next plays Kathy Scruggs in Clint Eastwood's biopic Richard Jewell, which hits US theaters December 13 and UK theaters January 31.

Meanwhile, Jason is hard at work on a new comedy series for Disney+ in which his NBC Sports football coach character Ted Lasso is hired to manage an English soccer team.
